ppsharedfilestorage_nokey: The perspectives sharedfilestorage service did not receive a key.

ppsharedfilestorage_maxfilesreached: The perspectives sharedfilestorage does not accept more files.

chatcomponent_nostorageservice: For this installation, no functioning shared file storage could be configured. This means you cannot share media files.
chatComponent_limit_body: You have not configured your own file storage yet. See below.
chatComponent_exhausted_body: Until you configure your own file storage, you cannot share media files with peers. See below.
chatComponent_instruction_body1: To share files, your installation needs a place to put them in, where others can fetch them from. Currently it uses a cloud service provided by courtesy of the Perspectives project. However, this use is limited and you have {{remainingUploads}} uploads left. [[link:MySharedFileServices|Set up your own storage]] (for free).
chatComponent_instruction_body2: You have exhausted the default storage facility provided by courtesy of the Perspectives project. In order to keep sharing files with others, [[link:MySharedFileServices|set up your own storage]] (for free).
